title: No allocative efficiency for price makers

content.question: The condition for allocative efficiency is violated when

choices.label: firms are price makers( price searchers)
short-run profits exist in a competitive industry
the market demand curve is inelastic in a competitive industry
the market demand curve is elastic in a competitive industry

content.answer: firms are price makers( price searchers)
